New Records: Bowden Francis has a 0.62 ERA over past 4 starts (29 IP)
Key Match Events: Bowden Francis took a no-hitter into the sixth inning
Jarren Duran was caught stealing at second
Nick Sogard singled on a flare to left field but was quickly retired
Bowden Francis tossed seven shutout innings with only 70 pitches and 5 strikeouts
Pre-Game Insights: Manager John Schneider mentioned Francis has been coming out in his last few outings on the attack from the get-go
Francis mentioned he's been clicking and has been good with his pitch mix
Post-Match Reflections: Manager John Schneider said he's running out of things to say about Francis
Francis said he's trying to go out there and win every game he's pitching and the numbers will take care of themselves
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays earned a split of the four-game series with the win
The Blue Jays won the continuation of their suspended game from June 26 on Monday
Francis was backed by a pair of timely RBI doubles from the Blue Jays' offense
Others: The game was played at Fenway Park
The Blue Jays are focusing on improvement after the win
